bug.author: tjchambers32
bug.description:
I am seeing this error - <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/7485>pytorch/pytorch#7485</denchmark-link>
Steps to reproduce the behavior (e.g. which model did you train? what parameters did you use? etc.). I'm following the tutorial here - <denchmark-link:https://github.com/zalandoresearch/flair/blob/master/resources/docs/TUTORIAL_7_TRAINING_A_MODEL.md>https://github.com/zalandoresearch/flair/blob/master/resources/docs/TUTORIAL_7_TRAINING_A_MODEL.md</denchmark-link>
Only difference is I created my own ColumnCorpus and I dropped the batch_size to 16 and epochs to 5 while I'm trying to get it working. Environment (please complete the following information):
OS: Windows 10 64 bit Version: flair 0.4.2

comments.comment: This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
